item.title: It's Electric!
item.description: For the final project of the Spring 2019 DSBA 5122: Visual Analytics at University of North Carolina Charlotte class we were tasked with creating an interactive Shiny app based a topic of our choosing. Earlier in the semester I was introduced to the Washington Post article Mapping how the United States generates its electricity. I was captivated by the visuals in the article of energy generation in the Untied states and the story they told.
